channel.title: Help with scar script command
channel.description: how do i register what keys i want it to press "such as enter" i got the command...however what are all the commands for that, and also how do i make the screen randomly rotate

item.title: Help with scar script command
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Well, the mouse clicks are on coordinates, and there isn’t any randomness in it, so it might get you flagged.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with scar script command
item.dc:creator: @killer_kure killer kure
item.description:
@killer_kure wrote:

[quote=“killer kure, post:14, topic:15097”]{=============================================]
auto mind buyer
v1.999
by killer kure (beginning layout by moon111)

Update Log:
1.0 first release

NOTE: you need to edit line 21 in the wait
part chose how long to wait 1000= 1 sec

must be in buying screen!

[=============================================}
program autobuyminds;
const
message1=’ fo shizzle dizzle!’;
message3=’ err budy in the club love a gangsta like me’;
message4= ’ wow i feel like a wigger wonder y?’;
message5= ’ sigh…nice talken to you’;
message6= ’ i used to know 50 cent but…we lost touch ‘;
message7= ’ in other words…we arent dawgz any more’;
message8= ’ i guess im just to much of a homogenius’;
message9= ’ i,m for shizzy nizzy’;

begin
repeat
wait(80+random(600));
MoveMouse(281,83)
wait(80+random(20));
ClickMouse(281,83,false)
wait(80+random(600));
SendArrowSilentWait(Random(4), 500 + Random(500));
SendArrowSilentWait(Random(4), 500 + Random(500));
MoveMouse(282,153)
wait(88+random(657))
ClickMouse(282,153,true)
wait(345+random(600))
sendkeys (message1)
SendKeys(Chr(13))
wait(564+random(200))
MoveMouse(281,83)
wait(300+random(453))
ClickMouse(281,83,false)
SendArrowSilentWait(Random(4), 500 + Random(500));
SendArrowSilentWait(Random(4), 500 + Random(500));
MoveMouse(282,153)
ClickMouse(282,153,true)
wait(231+random(600))
sendkeys(message3)
wait(165+random(564))
SendKeys(Chr(13))
wait(231+random(561))
sendkeys (message4)
wait(52+random(542))
SendKeys(Chr(13))
wait(213+random(600))
until(false)
end.

i was curious on how to make it… use the auto talks randomly thank you very much[br][size=1]Posted at: September 20, 2006, 07:31:21 AM[/size][hr]no1 wanne help me :’([/quote]

can any1 tell me if that script is detectable if only used for under 10 mins and if i t is can some1 fix it up for me plz tyvm

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Help with scar script command
item.dc:creator: @Can Can
item.description:
@Can wrote:

Well…

If SRL, then

Simply use the “Mouse” function and add in randoms on x, y.

If No SRL, then

dmrp:= 28+random(25);
MoveMouseSmoothEx(1+random(650), 1+random(450), 5, 10, dmrp, 10, 5);
GetMousePos(dcx, dcy);
HoldMouse(dcx+1, dcy, true);
wait(55 + random(55));
ReleaseMouse(dcx, dcy, true);
wait(10 + random(51));

Remember that dmrp should be an integer. So if you make it into a function. Do something like this:

Procedure moveandclick;
Var
dmrp: integer;
begin
dmrp:= 28+random(25);
MoveMouseSmoothEx(1+random(650), 1+random(450), 5, 10, dmrp, 10, 5);
GetMousePos(dcx, dcy);
HoldMouse(dcx+1, dcy, true);
wait(55 + random(55));
ReleaseMouse(dcx, dcy, true);
wait(10 + random(51));
End;

Hope You got what you were asking for. (It moves the mouse at a random location and clicks.)

Love -Can

Read full topic

item.title: Help with scar script command
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Weibs:

Weird, um, well I make one right now, but if I get some time later tonight ( After my homework ) I’ll throw together a random-rotate procedure for you.

Sorry…

Credits go to Stupid, I just jacked the Rotating from his RotateEvery procedure in SRL AntiBan…
[scar]procedure RandomRotate(MakeNorth : Boolean);
begin
SendArrowSilentWait(Random(4), 500 + Random(500));
SendArrowSilentWait(Random(4), 500 + Random(500));
if MakeNorth then
MakeCompass(‘N’);
end;[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with scar script command
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I was wonderin how you use SendKeysVB. So can you use this

SendKeysVB(’{K}’, True);

To type ‘K’? or is it just keys like Enter and Shift?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with scar script command
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

or a much better one would be…

SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);

Since some people’s KeyBoards have their characters different. I forget where, but I think in the neatherlands or somewhere. That’s why the SendKeysVB owns.

and you don’t have to use SendKeysSilente either. You could use SendKeys instead…

SendKeys(Chr(13));

~Ron

Read full topic
